{{cpp/io/basic_istream/title | gcount}}
{{cpp/io/basic_istream/navbar}}
{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl |
std::streamsize gcount() const;
}}
{{dcl end}}

Returns the number of characters extracted by the last [[cpp/named req/UnformattedInputFunction|unformatted input operation]], or the maximum representable value of {{lc|std::streamsize}} if the number is not representable.

The following member functions of {{tt|basic_istream}} change the value of subsequent {{tt|gcount()}} calls:

* {{rlp|basic_istream|move constructor}}
* {{lc|swap()}}
* {{lc|get()}}
* {{lc|getline()}}
* {{lc|ignore()}}
* {{lc|read()}}
* {{lc|readsome()}}
* {{lc|operator&gt;&gt;|operator&gt;&gt;(basic_streambuf*)}}

The following functions set {{tt|gcount()}} to zero:

* {{rlp|basic_istream|constructor}}
* {{lc|putback()}}
* {{lc|unget()}}
* {{lc|peek()}}

===Parameters===
(none)

===Return value===
The number of characters extracted by the last unformatted input operation, or the maximum representable value of {{lc|std::streamsize}} if the number is not representable.

===Example===
{{example
 | code=
#include &lt;iostream&gt;
#include &lt;sstream&gt;
 
int main()
{
    char x[20];
    std::istringstream stream("Hello World");
    
    stream.read(x, sizeof x);
    std::cout &lt;&lt; "Characters extracted: " &lt;&lt; stream.gcount();
}
 | output=Characters extracted: 11
}}
